mapper.sql: id, user_id, mobile, senior_order_no, senior_type, senior_pay, valid_month, start_date, end_date, pay_type, order_status, add_time, update_time
mapper.select:
select
from order_senior where mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=NUMERIC} and order_status = 1 order by add_time desc;
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS id
